attributes.action: Change the law of different sex siblings being allowed to share a bedroom
attributes.additional_details: Review this law and allow people in social housing to have separate bedrooms for children of gender over a certain age
attributes.background: The law regarding different sex siblings sharing a bedroom hasn't been updated since 1935!! This needs reviewing immediately. I doubt everyone in government would allow their child to sleep in the living room if you only had a 2 bedroom house and a child of each sex.

rejection.details:
The House of Commons Library states that there is no age at which it’s unlawful for siblings to share a bedroom, including siblings of opposite sexes.

You can find more information here: 
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/does-the-law-set-an-age-at-which-children-cant-share-a-bedroom/
